name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qmed Copilot: Medical Scribe, Ask CPG

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly integrate Qmed Copilot into your workflow for intelligent, real-time clinical assistance on any page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Qmed Copilot - Your Pocket Clinical AI Assistant for Modern Healthcare

Qmed Copilot is more than an AI assistant—it’s a transformative tool designed to reduce documentation time, improve diagnostic accuracy, and enhance clinical efficiency, all from your pocket. Built for the demands of fast-paced clinical environments, Qmed Copilot empowers healthcare professionals with advanced, intuitive AI that works seamlessly with your workflow.

1. Medical Scribe
- Instant Documentation: Generate clinical notes in under 30 seconds.
- Ambient AI Support: Keeps you focused on patient care.
- Multilingual: Supports English, Mandarin, Malay, Indonesian, and mixed languages.
- Specialty-Specific: Customizable templates for different specialties.
- EMR Integration: Works with selected EMRs for seamless updates.

2. Ask CPG
- Local Knowledge Hub: Instant answers from Clinical Practice Guidelines.
- Quick Reference: Easy access to trusted treatment info.

3. Worldwide Search
- Latest Evidence: Up-to-date PubMed research.
- Global Best Practices: Direct link to the latest in medicine.

4. Medical Summarization & ICD-11 Coding
- Streamlined Summaries: Quick summaries of histories and notes.
- Accurate Coding: AI-driven ICD-11 suggestions.

5. Differential Diagnosis (DDx)
- Enhanced Support: Fast differential diagnosis suggestions.

Qmed Copilot is purpose-built to support healthcare professionals in every moment of care, providing you with the right insights, the right documentation tools, and the right research resources—all in one place. Experience a new era of clinical efficiency, precision, and patient engagement with Qmed Copilot as your trusted AI assistant.

Learn more about Qmed Copilot on www.qmed.ai
